resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/521803971</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>521803971</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15899</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">G 10</string>
            <string language="en">Green 10</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grün 10</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vert 10</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Verde 10</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πράσινα 10</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Verde 10</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Si tratta di un esercizio di abbinamenti tra il G 10 ed i loro logo/simboli. Gli alunni saranno consapevoli di 10 organizzazioni ambientali non governative leader attive a livello di UE. Questo LO mira ad accrescere la consapevolezza dell'importanza dello sviluppo sostenibile e dell'ambiente nella nostra vita</string>
            <string language="en">It is a matching exercise about the Green 10 and their logos/symbols. Pupils will be aware of 10 leading environmental non-governmental organisations active at the EU level. This learning object aims at raising awareness of the importance of sustainable development and environment in our life.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">I Green 10</string>
            <string language="en">the Green 10</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">istituzioni ambientali non governative</string>
            <string language="en">environmental non-governmental institutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">logo</string>
            <string language="en">logos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">istituzioni legislative dell'UE</string>
            <string language="en">EU-law making institutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">livello dell'UE</string>
            <string language="en">EU level</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Es ist eine zusammenpassende Übung über die 
grünen 10 und ihr logos/symbols. Schüler berücksichtigen 10 
führende nichtstaatliche umweltsmäßigorganisationen, die auf der 
EU-Stufe aktiv sind. Diese erlernennachricht strebt an, 
Bewußtsein des Wertes der stützbaren Entwicklung und der Umgebung in
unserer Lebensdauer aufzuwerfen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un exercice assorti environ les 10 verts et 
leur logos/symbols. Les élèves se rendront compte de 10 
principales organisations nonnes gouvernemental environnementales 
actives au niveau d'EU. Cet objet d'étude vise à soulever la 
conscience d'importance du développement et de l'environnement 
soutenables dans notre vie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">É um exercício combinando sobre os 10 verdes e 
seu logos/symbols. Os alunos estarão cientes de 10 
organizações non-governmental ambientais principais ativas no nível
do EU. Este objeto de aprendizagem visa levantar a consciência 
da importância do desenvolvimento e do ambiente sustainable em nossa 
vida.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είναι μια ταιριάζοντας με άσκηση για τα πράσινα 10 και
τα λογότυπα/οι μαθητές συμβόλων τους γνωρίζουν 10 κορυφαίες 
περιβαλλοντικές μη κυβερνητικές οργανώσεις ενεργές στο επίπεδο 
της ΕΕ. Αυτό το αντικείμενο εκμάθησης στοχεύει να βελτιώσει
την πληροφόρηση της σημασίας της βιώσιμης ανάπτυξης και του 
περιβάλλοντος στη ζωή μας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Es un ejercicio que corresponde con sobre los 10 
verdes y su logos/symbols. Las pupilas estarán enteradas de 10 
organizaciones no gubernamentales ambientales principales activas en 
el nivel del EU. Este objeto que aprende tiene como objetivo el 
levantar del conocimiento de la importancia del desarrollo y del 
ambiente sostenibles en nuestra vida.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die grünen 10</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">nichtstaatliche umweltsmäßiganstalten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Firmenzeichen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eu-Gesetz, das Anstalten bildet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">EU-Stufe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les 10 verts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">établissements non gouvernementaux environnementaux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">logos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Eu-loi faisant des établissements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Niveau d'EU</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os 10 verdes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instituições non-governmental ambientais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">logos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">EU-lei que faz instituições</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nível do EU</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τα πράσινα 10</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιβαλλοντικά μη κυβερνητικά όργανα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογότυπα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ΕΕ-ΝΌΜΟΣ που κάνει τα όργανα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίπεδο της ΕΕ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los 10 verdes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">instituciones no gubernamentales ambientales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">insignias</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">EU-ley que hace a instituciones</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Nivel del EU</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
